info.name: † Facebook Remove Left Sidebar †
info.description:
This style removes everything in the left sidebar except for your name and "Shortcuts."
HD Preview
──↝⊰ ∙✦∙ ⊱↜──
Previously known as unholymaster, my last account was banned, so I'm reposting all of my styles.
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.1 Change Log: 12/05/2016 // Created. 11/06/2016 // Tidied up coding. 10/07/2016 // Added coding to remove new fundraisers navigation. 11/02/2017 // Minor fixes. 12/02/2017 // Added coding to remove create navigation. 21/06/2017 // Tidied up coding. 26/07/2017 // Updated credit to new username.
